qas.question: Which cardinal is known by all the Catholic Church?

plausible_answers.text: not even the cardinal so named is necessarily aware of his elevation,

qas.question: What does the cardinal named pectore know?
What can a cardinal in pectore continue to function as?
What is done to cardinals that does not protect them or their congregations?

context: A cardinal named <b0_0>in pectore<b0_0/> is known only to the pope; <b1_0>not even the cardinal so named is necessarily aware of his elevation,<b1_0/> and in any event <b2_0>cannot function as a cardinal<b2_0/> while his appointment is in pectore. Today, cardinals are <b3_0>named in pectore<b3_0/> to protect them or their congregations from reprisals if their identities were known.
